resources.string: You need to grant permission to read your phone state in order to continue. This permission lets the app to uniquely identify a User.
In order to save the content, you need to grant permission for the app to write to the external storage.
To provide you with the best personalized content, we\u0027ll need your permission to read location data.
StrmEasy wants you to enable High Accuracy mode
to deliver the content most relevant to your location
No Internet Connection! Please check your internet settings and try again!
